title: Masteries
body: Multiple times in the last few weeks it will not let me edit my masteries when in lobby.  Is this something wrong with the new client? It always says "Cannot connect to masteries server. This could be a connection issue." Its obviously not a connection issue since i'm able to stream and do other things. It will not let me change them or even add new pages. Any ideas?

replies.body:
Actually, because different servers/services reside in different geolocations, this could definitely be a connection issue, more specifically, a routing issue to specifically our servers. These issues are commonly caused by conflicting network settings on your local network, so I advise you to work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure that's not the case!

Please let me know if this caused any change for you.
